status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"164uu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jdsi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3sanr","text":"Cut out two small regions of each plexus sheet in PBS at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"flurh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"9vt4b","text":"Note: The plexuses are fragile. At each wash, use a micropipette and a dissecting microscope to carefully remove the solution from the well not suck up the plexus.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5B08CF9020A911EEBBC3DFFE4067CC2B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b8f1u","text":"Add each tissue section to separate wells in a 96 well dish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ssv","text":"Add 10% normal donkey serum (Jackson Immunoresearch, Cat #017-000-121; West Grove, PA) and 1% Triton-X in PBS. Leave in blocking solution for   at   on a rotator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":142,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":147,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"F53B4C5020A911EEBBC3DFFE4067CC2B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F7B266D020A911EEBBC3DFFE4067CC2B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ip2j","text":"Incubate the tissue   at   on a rotator with primary antibodies in 10% normal donkey serum, 1% Triton-X in PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"FDD87F9020A911EEBBC3DFFE4067CC2B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"024B6A1020AA11EEBBC3DFFE4067CC2B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"86ofj","text":"Stain sections with antibodies against tyrosine hydroxylase (TH) (1:500, Millipore-Sigma, Cat # AB152; Burlington, MA) and CD3 (1:400, Bio-Rad Laboratories, Cat #MCA2690; Hercules, CA), ANNA1 (1:32,000; kind gift by the Gershon laboratory (Margolis et al., 2016)), Iba1 (1:500, WAKO, Cat # 019-19741; Richmond, VA), CD68 (1:1000, Abcam, Cat # ab53444; Waltham, MA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqgbt","text":"On Day 2, remove the primary antibody solution from each well and wash.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1p34e","text":"Incubate in secondary antibody (1:1000) in blocking solution for   at  , covered on a rotator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e5c97","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"588D79E020AA11EEBBC3DFFE4067CC2B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"60452F2020AA11EEBBC3DFFE4067CC2B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6r7hr","text":"Wash again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"91u1u","text":"Mount on slide with vectashield medium with DAPI","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5v71r","text":"Imaging:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5l133","text":"For imaging enteric neurons, for each plexus collect 2-3, 2x2 tile z-stack 640.17x640.17 µm confocal images at 20x magnification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1cb5a","text":"Analysis:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89asa","text":"For imaging macrophages, for each plexus collect 2-3, 2x2 tile z-stack 390.09 x 390.09 µm confocal images at 20x magnification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0mlv","text":"Count the number of ANNA1+, TH+ cells, and IBA1+ cells for each stacked image using Fiji.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":25,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":30,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":47,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2m2sf","text":"Within the SP, threshold the TH+ signal, then analyze mean fluorescent intensity (MFI) and the area of the TH signal. Keep the thresholding consistent across each image, animal, and condition within each experiment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":31,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33ni8","text":"Within each animal, sum the the number of ANNA1+ , TH+ cells, and IBA1+ cells across all images separately then divide by the acquisition area.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":47,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":53,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":70,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bgdos","text":"For each experiment, normalize to the CFA only condition.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gc4h","text":"Wash with PBS-Tween (0.1%) for  . (1/3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fl7p8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"3F6D494020AA11EEBBC3DFFE4067CC2B","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
